title: spec: Integer Operators - Confusing figure/improper formatting
body:
Under Arithmetic Operators -> Integer Operators When discussing the exceptions to the truncate towards zero rule we are presented with this figure: 
						 x, q
int8                     -128
int16                  -32768
int32             -2147483648
int64    -9223372036854775808
At first I found the figure to be confusing and thought that maybe it was missing values on the right. Later I realized that x refers to the types on the left. Here is what I propose as an alternative: 
x						    q
int8                     -128
int16                  -32768
int32             -2147483648
int64    -9223372036854775808
